mapper.select: select u.t_id id, u.t_user_account userName, u.t_user_pwd pwd, u.t_emp_no empNo, u.t_role_id as "role.id" , u.t_create_time as "role.createTime", u.t_user_status userStatus, e.t_employ_name as "employ.employNo", r.t_role_name as "role.roleName" from t_user u inner join t_employ e on u.t_emp_no=e.t_employ_no inner join t_role r on u.t_role_id=r.t_id where t_user_account= #{userName}and t_user_pwd=#{pwd}
